captions.text: At the end of a long, tiring day
I convince myself and my heart full of sighs
Today, tomorrow, I get up again
Do you hear us shouting in sadness?
Even when darkness fell on our walk
We held our hands in hands and stayed a team
Why aren’t we getting any answers?
Why have you been hiding in silence?

comments.author: masriani mars

comments.text:
At first I thought this movie is not interesting at all. So i didn't watch 
it when it was released. But I after I watched EXO Next Door, I could see 
D.O's talent in acting. So I decided to to watch Cart. And now, I regret it 
because I was watching the movie in the middle of the night and I just 
can't stop crying(it's 5am rn). Cart is a really great movie which taught 
me not to give up no matter what challenges you're going to face. At the 
end of the movie, I was pretty much calm(not really) but as soon as the 
credit starts..... *cried a river* 
P/s: you guys should really watch the movie. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. ﻿
